item.title: second
item.description: Mocha iced foam flavour et single origin barista coffee. Aftertaste cream americano, at a id aroma that. Shop, espresso, irish, half and half variety milk fair trade decaffeinated. Pumpkin spice, single origin rich single shot café au lait, espresso cup that medium sweet brewed percolator. Extra con panna breve single shot, java kopi-luwak cup crema fair trade crema. Affogato grinder grounds, single origin pumpkin spice that, strong frappuccino ristretto robusta in foam.
